snippet.title: Metroid Prime 2 Echoes - Japanese NPC! Trailer
snippet.description:
New Play Control! - Metroid Prime 2 Echoes - Wii | Nintendo

Check out the updated graphics in the New Play Control! version of Metroid Prime 2 Echoes! Note: this game may not be released outside of Japan, due to the upcoming Metroid Prime Trilogy collection - due for release soon in Western areas. This collection will include all three of the Prime games, with the first two being updated for the Wii, and will cost just $50 (USD).

Check out http://www.Wiiloveit.com for more Nintendo goodness!
Twitter: http://twitter.com/Wiiloveit YouTube: http://youtube.com/WiiloveitTV
